https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/s021amFQmwPJMcMltqFZ0hU42vj.jpg A high-school girl who lives in a rural town in Japan struggles to define her own way in life. To help her impoverished family she works as a video fetish performer which leads to problems for her and her family with a criminal underworld. Demolition Girl
